name: baseline_5refs_base
input:
Baier, P. (2020). Environmental, social and governance reporting in annual reports. Financial Markets and Portfolio Management, 34(4), 493-536.

Chava, S. (2014). Environmental externalities and cost of capital. Management Science, 60(9), 2223-2247.

Hummel, K. (2016). Sustainability performance and disclosure quality. Journal of Accounting and Public Policy, 35, 455-476.

Li, M. (2020). Corporate social responsibility and governance quality in listed firms. Accounting Review, 18(2), 101-128.

Smith, J. (2018). Sustainability disclosure and reporting quality. Journal of ESG Studies, 7(1), 15-30.
notes: source=baseline_5refs.txt; baseline original with blank-line separators; expected_count fixed to 5

name: baseline_5refs_punct
input:
Baier, P。 （2020)。 Environmental, social and governance reporting in annual reports。 Financial Markets and Portfolio Management， 34（4）, 493－536。

Chava, S。 （2014)。 Environmental externalities and cost of capital. Management Science, 60(9)， 2223－2247.

Hummel， K. (2016）. Sustainability performance and disclosure quality。 Journal of Accounting and Public Policy, 35, 455－476。

Li， M. (2020）. Corporate social responsibility and governance quality in listed firms. Accounting Review， 18（2）, 101－128。

Smith, J。 （2018)。 Sustainability disclosure and reporting quality. Journal of ESG Studies, 7（1）, 15-30。
notes: source=baseline_5refs.txt; apply deterministic full/half punctuation swaps and dash perturbation; expected_count fixed to 5
